arabic: يَا مُصْطَفِيَ مُحَمَّدٍ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَ آلِهِ
translation: In the first rak'ah after Sura al Fatiha, recite 1000 times Sura al Ikhlas (or 100 or 10 if 1000 is not possible]
In the second rak'ah recite Sura al Ikhlas once after Sura Al Fatiha
After completed the prayer, go into sajdah and say:
In the Name of Allāh, the All-beneficent, the All-merciful.
O Posessor of grace and generosity
O Posessor of grace and might
O He who made a choice of Muhammad to place His trust in him, blessings of Allah be on him and on his children
send blessing on Muhammad and on his children
transliteration: yā muṣṭafiya muḥammadin ṣallallāhu `alayhi wa ālih
